item.title: Pixel Tower Defense Codes (October 2024)
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/pixel-tower-defense-codes

Dig into these redeemable codes for free coins, spins and other useful goodies.

Looking to bolster your team in Pixel Tower Defense with some redeemable codes? We’ve got you covered. Below, you’ll find all the active codes currently available for Pixel Tower Defense in October 2024, so you can redeem coins, spins and other useful goodies in the Roblox game.

Active Pixel Tower Defense Codes (October 2024)

Below, you'll find all the currently active and working Pixel Tower Defense codes in October 2024:

  • 60KLIKES - 500 Coins, 2x Luck for 30 Minutes (NEW!)
  • FREDDY - 200 Pumpkins (NEW!)
  • 50KLIKES - 100 Pumpkins, 1 Spin
  • 40KLIKES - 300 Coins, 1 Spin
  • HALLOWEEN - 100 Pumpkins
  • SPYDER - 250 Coins, 1 Spin
  • UPD4 - 500 Coins, 2x Luck for 30 Minutes

All Expired Pixel Tower Defense Codes

The following Pixel Tower Defense codes are expired and no longer working in October 2024:

  • OceanEvent
  • Update7

How to Redeem Pixel Tower Defense Codes

To redeem Pixel Tower Defense codes, boot up the game and, once you’re in, follow the steps below:

  1. Look at the icons on the right-hand side of the screen. You’ll see three labelled icons.
  2. Click on the codes icon marked by the X symbol. It'll bring up the codes tab.
  3. Enter your code into the code bar, being careful to make sure it’s in the right case and spelt correctly.
  4. Click Claim and you should see the resources you unlock appear just below the claim bar.

Why Isn’t My Pixel Tower Defense Code Working?

If your Pixel Tower Defense code isn’t working, it’s likely due to one of two scenarios. The first is that the code was inputted incorrectly. Pixel Tower Defense Codes are sometimes in standard case or entirely in upper case, so make sure you have the code inputted correctly before you hit claim. You can even copy and paste the codes directly from this article over to Roblox if you want to make sure you’re inputting them correctly.

The other possibility is the code has expired or you’ve already used it. If you’ve used it, you’ll get a message below the bar reminding you it has already been redeemed. If you’ve inputted it and it doesn’t recognise the code at all, it likely means it's no longer available to use. Not to worry though as Pixel Tower Defense gives out new codes often, so there’s sure to be new bonuses on the way very soon.

How to Get More Pixel Tower Defense Codes

If you’re looking to scout out some Pixel Tower Defense codes yourself, the easiest way is through the game’s official Discord, which you can find here. After joining, you’ll be able to hop into the codes channel to find all the latest codes as they drop.

You can also follow Luke (Instance0New) over on X, where the creator frequently drops new codes for the community.

What is Pixel Tower Defense in Roblox?

Pixel Tower Defense is a tower defence game with a simple premise. Buy units, take them into tactical scenarios where hundreds of enemies flood the screen and use them to prevent your foes from eliminating your home base. Each scenario is set across a series of rounds, with the end of each round supplying you with cash you can use to build or upgrade your current forces.

Although that seems simple enough, the game will frequently challenge you with harder levels and enemies that exploit your defence, forcing you to think tactically and carefully deliberate on how to spend your accumulated cash and dominate the battlefield.

Callum Williams is an IGN freelancer covering features and guides. When he's away from his desk, you can usually find him obsessing over the lore of the latest obscure indie horror game or bashing his head against a boss in the newest soulslike. You can catch him over on Twitter at @CaIIumWilliams.

In This Article

item.title: It Girl Codes (October 2024)
item.content:encoded:
https://www.ign.com/articles/it-girl-codes

Looking for extra diamonds or new cosmetics in It Girl? This page has compiled every redeemable code currently available in It Girl, so you can instantly get your hands on both in the Roblox fashion game.

Active It Girl Codes (October 2024)

Below, you'll find a list of every active and working It Girl code in October 2024:

  • ITGIRL - 250x Diamonds
  • PH4NT0MM4X - Free Mask Item
  • TAVERSIA - Rose Crown Item
  • MADDYAFK - 200x Diamonds
  • RUPAULSD0LL - Silver Crown item

How to Redeem It Girl Codes

To redeem It Girl codes, launch the game and, once you’re in, follow the steps below:

  1. Look at the icons on the left-hand side of the screen. You’ll see two icons above the diamond counter.
  2. Click on the gear icon to open the settings tab. At the top of the tab, you'll see a codes bar.
  3. Input your code in this bar, being careful to make sure it’s in the right case and spelt correctly.
  4. Click the Redeem button and you should see a message confirming the code was successful at the bottom of the screen.

Why Isn’t My It Girl Code Working?

If your It Girl code isn’t working, it’s likely due to one of two scenarios. The first is that the code was inputted incorrectly. Make sure you have the code inputted exactly as it is in the Active Codes section above. You can even copy and paste codes directly from this article over to Roblox if you want to make sure you’re inputting them correctly.

The other possibility is the code has expired or you’ve already used it. If you’ve used it, you’ll get a message below the bar reminding you the inputted code has already been redeemed. If you’ve inputted the code and it doesn’t recognise it at all, it likely means it's no longer available to use.

How to Get More It Girl Codes

If you’re looking to scout out some It Girl codes yourself, the easiest way is through the game’s official Discord server. Once you're in, you can check the announcements channel for new codes, or chat with the community to see if any new codes have been released.

What is It Girl in Roblox?

It Girl is a fashion game where players are assigned a theme, dropped into a changing room and tasked with creating a unique look to match it. From changing your hairstyle and clothes to picking your makeup and accessories, you're given free rein to mix and match outfit pieces to create a striking design before modelling it for the other players in your lobby. If you've created a top-rated outfit, you win experience, allowing you to level up and continue pushing towards your goal of being the ultimate It Girl model.

Callum Williams is an IGN freelancer covering features and guides. When he's away from his desk, you can usually find him obsessing over the lore of the latest obscure indie horror game or bashing his head against a boss in the newest soulslike. You can catch him over on Twitter at @CaIIumWilliams.
